description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) has requirement for the supply and delivery of a diesel generator and training for NRCan technicians and all other qualified technicians. The procurement category is Goods and Services submitted by PWGSC On behalf of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) for a diesel generator(s) and training for the above-mentioned purposes. full_summary:
# **Government Tender Announcement**

## Overview
### Tender Number and Title
EW038-241722 - Diesel Generator

### Solicitation Number
WS4512303012

### Description of Requirement

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) seeks bids for the supply and delivery of a diesel generator. Additionally, the selected supplier must provide training for NRCan technicians and other qualified technicians on engine controllers, transfer switches, and networking systems. Offloading, commissioning, and set-up of the equipment are not required, but all aspects of set-up and commissioning must be included in the training. The equipment must be delivered to Ottawa, Ontario.

## Submission Requirements
Bids must be submitted by May 14, 2024 at 12:00 PM EDT. Bids received after 2:00 PM EDT will be considered non-responsive.

## Additional Documents
Please refer to the SAP Ariba Discovery posting at the provided link for complete details.

## Tenders Specifications
* UNSPSC Code: *26111601 - Diesel Generators
* Description: Supply and delivery of a diesel generator and training on engine controllers, transfer switches, and networking systems

## Procurement Details

### Trade Agreements
The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) is applicable to this tender.

### Regions of Opportunity
None.

### Regions of Delivery
Resolute Bay.

### Procurement Category
General Department (GD)

### Notice Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Tender Status

Closed on May 21, 2024 at 2:00 PM EDT.

## Contact Information

For further information or clarification, please contact:
Virakorn, Matthew (SPAC/PSPC)
mattew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
